thread.title: Josh Selkovits

author: Josh Selkovits
title: Josh Selkovits
text:
Marcell didn't mind that I was ripping boxes open in my new apartment (recently moved) while we spoke and patiently answered all my questions and scheduled a tech to come out the NEXT DAY!
The tech that came was so knowledgeable and helpful. He went above and beyond the call of duty by helping me setup my xbox one, TV...everything. He was so great on every level.
